trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around February 1st 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my backyard having a cigarette around 1am. It was a clear night and I was looking up at the stars. My wife came out also and we were talking and as I was looking up at the stars I noticed what seemed like a small red star moving across the sky. I then saw several more red lights following the first one. I estimate there were about 10-15 red lights in what I guess you might call a convoy. The most amazing thing was that some of the red lights would shoot out sideways then return to the group. They were doing this on either side of the convoy. Shooting out then returning. My wife and I kept saying to each other "What the hell is this, these are not airplanes" The group of lights were heading north-east by my estimate. When the group began to dissapear in the distance another group of lights appeared. They also were travelling in the same direction as the first group. The entire incident lasted about two minutes.
